name: Hurt (ted_f_p)
description:
Explore around and figure out what happened and where it's going.

Press Shift to zoom in (not very useful with current content, but nice to use when looking at stuff).

Escape to exit

Left mouse button to interact

WASD movement.

Extra info (Might contain Spoilers:)

Hurt was made for #MiniJam65 - Abandoned Jam Link: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-65-abandoned 

It was not uploaded in time but it's up now.

NOTE: This is a small part of a larger game. But ambition is one hell of a drug. The initial idea involved around 4x times more content. At the time of the jam, it was extremely buggy so I spent a few hours fixing everything and adding an "ending".


Credits:

CREEPY LITTLE GIRL TALKING, SINGING, LAUGHING, HUMMING - By Lara Sluyter
Smoke Monster - Lost
